name: Zaprite Payment Gateway – Accept Bitcoin and Fiat payments in WooCommerce
author: zaprite

sections.description:
Zaprite Payment Gateway for WooCommerce enables your ecommerce store to accept Bitcoin, Lightning, Liquid and card payments in one unified Checkout experience.
This plugin integrates seamlessly with your WooCommerce Checkout, providing a fast, secure, and low-cost payment option for your customers.

Features:
– Accept Bitcoin, Lightning and Liquid payments directly to your wallet.
– Accept card payments via Stripe or Square.
– Easy setup and configuration within WooCommerce settings.
– QR code generation for easy payments.
– Transaction history and CSV export for easy reconciliation.

Why Choose Zaprite?
– Lower transaction fees compared to traditional payment methods.
– Enhanced security and privacy for your customers.
– No intermediaries or third parties, receive payments directly.

Demo

To see a live demo, please visit https://woo.zaprite.dev.

Support

For support and feature requests, please visit https://zaprite.zendesk.com/hc/en-ca.

Additional Notes

Zaprite is not affiliated with or endorsed by WooCommerce or WordPress. This plugin is developed and maintained by Zaprite.
sections.installation:
1. Navigate to Plugins > Add New Plugin, then search for ‘zaprite’ in the
    official WordPress directory.
  2. Click ‘Install Now’, then once installed, click to Activate the plugin.
  3. Navigate to WooCommerce > Settings > Payments.
  4. Enable the Zaprite plugin, then click on ‘Manage’ to configure the payment
    gateway settings.
